auth.description:
To obtain a token:

  1. Log in to your Ntfy instance.
  2. Click on Account
  3. Go under, on Access tokens and click on the button icon to copy your Token or CREATE ACCESS TOKEN if you do not have
  4. Please pay attention to the expiration time when copying/creating a Token.
  4. Copy your access token & and paste them into the fields below.

topic.description: The topic/channel to send the notification to, e.g. test1

priority.description: The priority of the notification (1-5). 1 is lowest priority.

icon.description: The absolute URL to your icon, e.g. https://example.com/communityIcon_xnt6chtnr2j21.png

actions.description: Add Action buttons to notifications, see https://docs.ntfy.sh/publish/#action-buttons

click.description: You can define which URL to open when a notification is clicked, see https://docs.ntfy.sh/publish/#click-action

delay.description: Let ntfy send messages at a later date, e.g. 'tomorrow, 10am', see https://docs.ntfy.sh/publish/#scheduled-delivery
